entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in Australia
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.

text: @chrislhayes Now 53,441 cases of coronavirus in US and 690 deaths. But Trump said it was 15 and would soon go to zero not that long ago. Now that numbers are skyrocketing, he wants to open up US economy in 2 weeks so he doesn't lose in Nov. What's wrong with this picture? Oh, right..humanity.
